name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Full-Stack Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in developing cutting-edge solutions integrating **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React**, **TypeScript**, and modern **JavaScript** frameworks. Proficient in employing CI/CD methodologies utilizing **GitHub**, **Jenkins**, **GitHub Actions**, and **SonarQube** to enhance development workflows and ensure clean code practices. Demonstrated expertise in creating scalable **microservices** architectures and implementing responsive designs using **HTML** and **CSS** within Agile team environments. 

Skilled in building high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, I lead projects that align with compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. My solid foundation in **unit testing** and design patterns enhances code quality and maintainability. I also excel in collaboration, driving successful project outcomes through effective teamwork and communication.
